summary: Simpler Dragonbone Weapons Pack made from the AeonVita\'s mod
descriptionHtml:
Simpler Dragonbone Weapons Pack

Description:

In short this mod adds several craftable weapons made of dragon bone to skyrim blacksmithing stations and buffs up the dragon plate armor so that it is slightly stronger than the Daedric counterparts. 

This mod was originally made by AeonVita and his crew SO ALL CREDITS GO TO THEM.
http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=1935

The only changes I made was to just remove certain weapons that I think cannot be made from dragon bones....IN MY OPINION bones cannot be made into Arrows (unless only the tips of arrows), Katana and Dai-katana, and Scimitar, and any of the Nordic Dragonbone weapons....they would be too brittle.....these weapons all look like they need durable/pliable metal to be that thin and sharp where as bones are strong and rigid so would have a ruff edged look to them thus only the orisch type weapons are kept with the default color of bones (see pics).

Also, removed the Dragon Heart requirement for crafting in place of leather strips. (you still need to have dragon smithing perk so smithig at 100 to have access to these weapons).

I have kept the dragonplate armor buff for I felt the same as AeonVita did (see his mod for details). 

This mod is for those like me who only want simpler parts of AeonVita\'s mod but can\'t mod; this edit was only done for my personal use but friends asked for it so I posted it; again all actual work was done by AeonVita so all thanks goes to him. (changes by me)

Crafting Recipes:
[Name - Base damage(Daedric equivalent)- Items required]
Dragonbone Sword - 16(14) - Dragon Bones + Dragon Scales + 2 Leather Strips
Dragonbone Dagger - 13(11) - Dragon Bones + Dragon Scales + 2 Leather Strips
Dragonbone Greatsword - 26(24) - 2 Dragon Bones + Dragon Scales + 2 Leather Strips
Dragonbone War Axe - 17(15) - Dragon Bones + Dragon Scales + 2 Leather Strips
Dragonbone Battleaxe - 27(25) - 2 Dragon Bones + Dragon Scales + 2 Leather Strips
Dragonbone Mace - 18(16) - Dragon Bones + Dragon Scales + 2 Leather Strips
Dragonbone Warhammer - 29(27) - 3 Dragon Bones + Dragon Scales + 2 Leather Strips
Dragonbone Bow - 21(19) - Dragon Bones + Dragon Scales + 4 Leather Strips

Improveing/tempering these weapons will cost 1 Dragon Bone at grinding stations.

Dragonplate armor buff:
[Name - Base armor(Daedric) - Default]
Dragonplate Armor - 51(49) - 46
Dragonplate Boots - 19(18) - 17
Dragonplate Gauntlets - 19(18) - 17
Dragonplate Helmet - 25(23) - 22
Dragonplate Shield - 38(36) - 34

Installation (Manual): 
- Download the main file 
- Open the main archive and move the \"Dragonbone Weapons.esp\", the textures, meshes, and strings folder 
  to Skyrim data directory. (These are all the files required)  
   c;\\program files\\the elder scrolls v skyrim\\data
- Make the game load the esp by checking the tick-box next to the newly added esp when starting 
  skyrim  see DATA FILES option

For different languages  the strings are from again the original mod  and same here, so pick one that suits you.

Uninstallation (Manual):
- Remove the \"Dragonbone Waepons.esp\" file from the \"Data\" folder in your Skyrim directory.
- Remove the \"textures\\Aeonvita\\\" and \"meshes\\AeonVita\\\" folders from the \"Data\" folder 
in your Skyrim directory.
- Remove the .strings files that starts with \"Dragonbone Weapons\" in the strings folder 
in your Skyrim data directory.

Have not had any bugs/issues but if there are comment, i am new to modding  so dont expect miracle fixes.

Comment, endorse its all good, All THANKS  GOES TO AeonVita  so check out his other great mods.
You may use this mod so long as you mention it origins and creators.
author: davnat and AeonVita
